properties.name: BitSight - drop in the headline rating

alertDetailsOverride.alertDisplayNameFormat: BitSight : Alert for drop in the headline rating of {{CompanyName}}.

properties.description: 'Rule helps to detect if headline ratings is drop in BitSight.'
properties.query:
let timeframe = 24h;
BitSightGraphData
| where ingestion_time() > ago(timeframe)
| where toint(RatingDifferance) < 0
| project RatingDate, Rating, CompanyName, RatingDifferance
